column2: the tables were filled and it was pretty loud. We could still have a conversation without yelling
column3: and I thought the crowd kind of added to the atmosphere. The staff was attentive
column4: and the tapas came out staggered so we were not bombarded at once with all of the plates. We ordered 1 cold and 3 hot plates
column5: and 4 plates between 2 people was plenty. We also split the sampler dessert order and all 6 options were delish.
